TopicTitle: Part of a story that I've been planning on making, but not yet.

Articles.Content:
"Back! Fall Back!"Sev shouted as the ground rumbled for some unknown reason. I start backwards, but it kicks through the closed bunker door, and I am caught on its foot. I grab a ladder rung, presumably to get up, and am lifted into the air.

"AAAAAAAAAAAH!" I can't tell who screamed.

"Sack!" Rend shouted. I looked down and saw the assault of enemies, as the foot comes back in. I start to climb up on every opening or wire that I can support my weight on. The miniguns mounted on the side of the legs blast, and I keep climbing. I reach the point where the legs connect, about 3.5 meters. I slap a magnetic grip on, and pull myself up. I grab hold of the handle just below the cockpit. I grab my pistol, and pull myself up one more set. I fire four, maybe five, rounds into the cockpit.
